player_character.backstory: Born beneath the silver-barked canopies of the Elven Forest of Altea, Lirael Veythari was raised among the whispering leaves and crystalline streams that crad

world_context.world_description: The Vale’s beauty masks its fragility. Centuries ago, it was a battlefield where dragon-riding knights repelled the Beastmen Hordes, leaving behind petrified scales that now fertilize the soil. Today, farmers whisper of "earth-sickness"—crops withering overnight, livestock growing fangs, and shadows moving against the wind. Travelers speak of the "Silent Bloom," a creeping blight turning forests into crystalline graveyards. With the Althean Church distracted by politics in the capital and the Shogunate’s patrols stretched thin, Kazamidori has become a haven for desperate souls and hidden threats alike.
